comment: use rank to customize how the image will be selected
1. use (kind, value) pair to specify how frequently the pattern of image will be selected
the value of WEIGHT represents a selected weight; the value of PERCENTAGE represents a selected possibility
2. use period to constrain the time the pattern of image can appear, the format is hhmm-hhmm
註解: rank用來設定圖片被呈現的時機：
1. 使用(kind, value) pair來設定該圖片類型顯示的頻率
其中WEIGHT的value指定被選擇的權重，PERCENTAGE的value指定被選擇的機率
2. 使用period限制該圖片類型顯示的時間，格式為hhmm-hhmm
